definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: Seems that fish don't like a din with dinner either.
sentences.chinese: 魚兒似乎也不喜歡用餐時有噪音。

sentences.english: Taste the food before the King eats to make sure it's not poisoned.
sentences.chinese: 在國王用餐之前先嚐嘗食物，確信飯菜沒有被下毒。

sentences.english: It is also impolite to have your elbows on the dining table when you are eating.
sentences.chinese: 而且在用餐時把手肘放在餐桌上是不禮貌的行爲。

sentences.english: You always hold fork in left hand and knife in right hand.
sentences.chinese: 用餐中一直左手拿叉又手拿刀。

sentences.english: For example, Capricorns like to eat in popular places with good prices .
sentences.chinese: 比如說，他們喜歡選擇在價格公道的大衆餐廳用餐。

sentences.english: We had dinner at an outdoor fish restaurant called Sallam.
sentences.chinese: 我們在一家名爲“薩蘭姆”的戶外魚鮮餐館用餐。

sentences.english: As I was finishing my meal, an older couple came in to dine.
sentences.chinese: 就在快喫完的時候，一對年長的夫婦走進來用餐。

sentences.english: At the beginning of a meal, take slightly less than what you think you'll eat.
sentences.chinese: 開始用餐時，取少於預想餐量的食物。

sentences.english: Mealtime is a time to dialogue.
sentences.chinese: 用餐時間是談話的好時機。

sentences.english: In-flight dining options will probably run the gamut from water to water.
sentences.chinese: 飛行過程中的用餐將很可能只有白開水。

sentences.english: Many diners enjoy bread with their soup.
sentences.chinese: 許多用餐者喜歡一邊喝湯一邊吃麪包。

sentences.english: Meals are only provided with voucher payment.
sentences.chinese: 憑用餐代金券在太陽村食堂就餐。

sentences.english: The no-nonsense tones of a stern parent; plain, no-nonsense meals at a diner.
sentences.chinese: 用餐者在一頓重要的宴會中使用的盤子。

sentences.english: You absolutely do not have to be a vegetarian to simplify your meals.
sentences.chinese: 你絕對不需要成爲一個素食主義者來精簡用餐。

sentences.english: Allegedly so that diners don't have to listen to their own screams.
sentences.chinese: 依其所述則用餐者就不必聽到自己的尖叫聲了。

sentences.english: There is a person putting together my order and taking time away from his or her dine-in customers.
sentences.chinese: 人家從正在餐廳用餐的顧客那裏抽身來爲我訂餐嘛。

definition: (at a restaurant) to order a meal/(of a waiter) to take an order
to have a meal/to eat/to make a living
